fpheading: 请输入你的注册邮箱地址
fp_email_success: 密码已经发送到你的邮箱
get_to_know: 了解你的在线学习课程
tap_drag_badge: 将徽章，并把它放到包里添加到您的收藏。
reg_success: 祝贺你已经注册成功！点击“确认”你将会重新回到登录页面。
loginauth_error: 我们不识别你的登录信息，请再试一次。请注意密码的大小写信息。
fp_no_record: 无效的电子邮件ID，请重新输入
enter_min_char: 密码强度应该是一个最低的六个字符
fill_all_fields: 请填写所有的密码字段值
pass_mismatch: 新密码和确认新密码不匹配
network_fail: 唉呦，请检查你的网络连接情况吧……
fp_invalid_email: 请输入一个有效的邮箱地址
popup_legal_cnt: 你提交的个人信息有可能被传输到倩碧位于美国的第三方公司的服务器，以便帮你完成登陆流程。如想了解更多有关信息，请阅读隐私权政策 。当你点击下方的'登录'键，系统将默认你同意将你的信息传输至倩碧美国的服务器。
popup_legal_cntReg: 你提交的个人信息有可能被传输到倩碧位于美国的第三方公司的服务器，以便帮你完成登陆流程。如想了解更多有关信息，请阅读隐私权政策 。当你点击下方的'保存'键，系统将默认你同意将你的信息传输至倩碧美国的服务器。
download_important: IMPORTANT: Please do not interrupt until download is complete.
ERR10001: Please check your Wi-Fi connection and try to download again.
ERR10002: We do not recognize your sign in information. Please try again. Please note the password field is case sensitive.
ERR10003: We do not recognize your sign in information. Please try again. Please note the password field is case sensitive.
ERR10004:
Welcome to the NEW Clinique eLearning! This app will allow you to download eLearning courses to this device. The courses will then be available to view and complete, even when this device is not connected to Wi-Fi. You must first follow these easy steps to get started:

1. Connect your device to Wi-Fi.

2. Log in to Clinique eLearning app.

3. Follow prompts to complete the download of Clinique eLearning materials. Whenever new material is available, you will be prompted to reconnect and download new courses.
ERR10005: We do not recognize your sign in information. Please try again. Please note the password field is case sensitive.
ERR10006:
Welcome to the NEW Clinique eLearning! This app will allow you to download eLearning courses to this device. The courses will then be available to view and complete, even when this device is not connected to Wi-Fi. You must first follow these easy steps to get started:

1. Connect your device to Wi-Fi.

2. Log in to Clinique eLearning app.

3. Follow prompts to complete the download of Clinique eLearning materials. Whenever new material is available, you will be prompted to reconnect and download new courses.
ERR10007: Please check your Wi-Fi connection and try to download again.
ERR10008: Please check your Wi-Fi connection. A Wi-Fi connection is required to complete this request.
ERR10009: There is not enough space on your device at this moment to download all the available content. Please make sure there is an additional {0} of space on the device to complete the sync process
ERR10011: Please check your Wi-Fi connection. A Wi-Fi connection is required to complete this request.
quizOffline: Thank you for completing a Quiz! Please note that if you are accessing this course without a Wi-Fi connection your score may not be updated immediately.
question: 试题
yourfinalgradeis: 这个测验您的最后得分是
reg-user-note: 用户名只能由字母和数字字符组成(不能包含标点符号)。请在小写字母键盘状态下输入，不能有空格。
reg-region-note: 请联系你的柜长或培训主管，以便获得您的登入密码。
